ingredients.content: 3 oz extra virgin olive oil, divided
10 ½ oz squid, sliced into rings (½ in.)

preparations.content: Peel and devein shrimp, reserve shrimp shells and refrigerate shrimp until needed. Place shrimp shells, 1 garlic clove and 1 oz olive oil into mixing bowl and chop <b>2 sec/speed 5<b>, then sauté <b>10 min/250°F/speed <b>.
Add water and cook <b>10 min/212°F/speed 1<b>. Strain through a fine sieve, reserve liquid and discard solids. Rinse mixing bowl and mixing bowl lid.
Place onion, 2 garlic cloves and 2 oz olive oil into mixing bowl and chop <b>4 sec/speed 4<b>. Sauté <b>8 min/250°F/speed <b>.
Add squid, wine, paprika and parsley, place simmering basket instead of measuring cup on top of mixing bowl lid and cook <b>13 min/Varoma//speed <b>.
Add saffron and reserved shrimp broth, place simmering basket instead of measuring cup on top of mixing bowl lid and cook <b>3 min/212°F//speed <b>.

Add rice and salt, place Varoma into position, add reserved shrimp, secure Varoma lid and cook <b>13 min/212°F//speed <b>. Remove Varoma and set aside. Transfer risotto to a bowl and let sit 5 minutes. Divide between 15 small bowls and top each with one cooked shrimp. Serve immediately.
